updates

⚇ bathrooms (study) ( Apr 2025 ) ⚇

Stage works in (and about) public bathrooms in response to the recent anti-trans UK Supreme Court ruling, statements made by the UK Government and the EHRC guidance.

See details here.


⚇ peter and the wolf and the hedgehog ( Apr 2025 ) ⚇

me and Agnes debuted our adapation of Prokofiev’s Peter And The Wolf (And The Hedgehog) with the Peckham Chamber Orchestra, including a brand new ending!


⚇ saom - live ( Feb 2025 ) ⚇

i recently did a short improvised set at SAOM using the new More Roar synth!
